headlines.description: Tavon Austin scored twice, Todd Gurley topped 1,000 yards rushing and the Rams beat the Tampa Bay Buccaneers 31-23 on Thursday night in what could be the franchise's final game in St. Louis.

video.headline: Case Keenum's nearly perfect night earns him a game ball

headlines.shortLinkText: Rams roll Bucs in possible last game in St. Louis

headlines.description: Randy Bullock kicked a 40-yard field goal with 36 seconds left and the Jets kept the pressure on Pittsburgh and Kansas City in the AFC wild-card race with a 19-16 victory over the Dallas.

headlines.shortLinkText: Jets use late FG to top Cowboys, maintain pace

headlines.description: Teddy Bridgewater threw a career-high four touchdowns and ran for another one, and the Minnesota Vikings took a significant step toward clinching a Playoff spot with a 38-17 victory Sunday.

headlines.description: Julio Jones scored for the first time in seven weeks, and the Atlanta Falcons ended a six-game losing streak with a 23-17 victory against the Jacksonville Jaguars on Sunday.

headlines.description: Brandon Weeden replaced injured quarterback T.J. Yates late in the first half and threw a go-ahead 8-yard TD pass to Jaelen Strong with 10:36 to play Sunday, giving Houston a 16-10 victory.

headlines.description: Graham Gano's 43-yard field goal as time expired kept Carolina perfect this season with a wild 38-35 victory over the New York Giants on Sunday.
